tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reputation_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES blockchain_participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES blockchain_participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reputation_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT NOT NULL,
    change_type ENUM('increase', 'decrease') NOT NULL,
    change_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    change_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES blockchain_participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES blockchain_participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE block_chain (
    chain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (block_id) REFERENCES blocks(block_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participant_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ParticipantRewards (
    participant_id INT,
    reward_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (participant_id, reward_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES Rewards(reward_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TransactionsHistory (
    transaction_id INT,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    transaction_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id)
);
